name: The Eclipse ("Overshadow.")
description:
The Eclipse, a day feared by men, spoken of in texts of old and young, speaking of a day the butchered will ensnare their revenge, you are, the fleshed, but these, disgusting creatures will stop you.

do not displeasure the ancient ones

By far my biggest game, the lore includes iodine, ^^^^^^ ^, The Crate Game, and The Eclipse, if you wish to interpret it.
